Question: This person had another productive season with averages of 19.6 points, 11.9 assists, and 6.2 rebounds per game.
Hints: Peter Guber, who is co-owner of the Golden State Warriors, owns a small stake in the Dodgers along with this person.
In 2012, this person endorsed Barack Obama for President.
In March 2012, this person's ownership group was announced as the winner of the proceedings to buy the Dodgers.
